name: Dualight
description:
You control a square that can turn into a beam of light to reflect off surfaces and defeat enemies. There's only one short level but you're scored at the end based on speed, kills, etc. Get good enough for an S rank and I'll give you a pat on the head, promise.

There are two types of light dashes- yellow and purple. Hit an enemy with a dash of its color to target it, then hit it again with the opposite color to make it go boom! (Includes a satisfying sound effect) You have a limited amount of dashes but they're replenished when you reflect off of something.

Controls:
WASD - Move and jump
Left click - Yellow dash
Right click - Purple dash
Space - Recharge (when on ground)
R - Restart
Esc - Close the game <--------- Pretty important!!!

I made this for a 72 hour Game Jam and plan to release a new version later with fewer bugs, more content, less bad music, and more polish overall- it'll be very gnarly. Oh, and you won't have to read the Itch.io page for controls... oops.
